sentences: Raskes mures on töö ainsaks päästeankruks.
context: The word 'päästab' is the 3rd person singular present form of the Estonian verb 'päästa', which means 'to save' or 'to rescue'. It can refer to saving someone from physical danger, emotional distress, or difficult circumstances. In the example sentence, 'Raskes mures on töö ainsaks päästeankruks,' it suggests that work serves as an anchor or salvation in times of great worry.
